Name: Percentage of Payment Handled out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled that are preceded by Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled from all Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Payment Handled with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled by SYSTEM
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of Payment Handled grouped by case:BudgetNumber
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled followed by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled in variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average number of Payment Handled per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled without preceding Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of Payment Handled in relation to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled in variants with budget owner approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total Payment Handled performed by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of Payment Handled over Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled in domestic travel declarations
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of Payment Handled after Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled within two months of trip completion
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Payment Handled in reimbursement claims
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled with supervisor approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Payment Handled in pre-paid travel cost processes
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled following director approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Average time between Request Payment and Payment Handled
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled in cases without any rejection activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' does not happen

Name: Number of Payment Handled made per year
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities
